name: Line Cook
description:
“Line Cook” is a simple puzzle game where you work as a line cook in a strange restaurant. Your task is to cook food using multiple stoves by connecting them with little conveyors.

The game is a very early, unfinished prototype.

The stoves need to be connected in a way that cooks the food by the right amount and then delivers the food to the destination. Some stoves cook more than others.

Credits:

  • Asuma W. (Artist)
  • Atte H. (Game designer, level designer)
  • Hana (Artist)
  • JinSu K. (Programmer)
  • Naoki I. (Producer)
  • Reo U. (Game designer, level designer)
